comment.author: 35578735@N08
comment._content: General Patton had two Colt 45 single Action revolvers,somehow they came in the hands of Mr.Owe Pettersson at Jarlsgatan in Uddevalla City-Sweden-as a Gift to Walther Evert Wilhelm Kegoe,alias Kaiser Soeze,alias son of Filmactress Gaby Stenberg-Koch,and father was Luftwaffles-JAM-H.Goering,Granfather on Mothers side to Valter Kegoe,was HIROHITO-Japan Emperor 1926.Daughters born in Kobe,as Hatta,Mikko & Cayo-in 1920 and 1923. Jakaranda-case on Silverplated Guns,and Pearly Handles.Green cloth coating inside.Seen with my ownn eyes 1964.
